## About this application
This app is built by [Dinesh Ladi](https://twitter.com/ladidinesh) for exploring a simulated data generated about lab tests from [here](https://github.com/fontes-lab/RShinyProgrammingExercise).

You can find more about me on:
* [Twitter](https://twitter.com/ladidinesh)
* [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/dineshladi)
* [GitHub](https://github.com/dineshladi)

## Tools Used:
* This app is built using a web framework in R called [{shiny}](https://shiny.rstudio.com)
* Data Visualization is done with [{ggplot2}](https://ggplot2.tidyverse.org)

Browse the source code for this app [here]{https://github.com/dineshladi/RShinyExcercise}
